A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: pretty bad movie\, not even 1 lightsaber battle\, too many stupid jokes\, too many furry animals to sell as merchandise later on\, very very few interesting things that matter happened leaving a sour taste in your mouth after waiting the movie\, that goes hand in hand with too many sub plots happening at the same time leading nowhere\, with very intereting characters with very small screen time.
